atk-s0402a44:2_2: Pañcame “nīce kule paccājāto”tiādikena tamena yuttoti tamo.
atk-s0402a44:3_13: bhikkhaveti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṁ adisvā mātu kucchimhiyeva kālaṁ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalampi kappaṁ saṁsarati.
atk-s0402a44:3_16: Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nipphatti hotīti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a44:4_0: Ettha ca “nīce kule”tiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva paccuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā.
atk-s0402a44:6_1: Chaṭṭhe oṇatoṇatoti idāni nīcako āyatimpi nīcako bhavissati.
atk-s0402a44:6_2: Oṇatuṇṇatoti idāni nīco āyatiṁ ucco bhavissati.
atk-s0402a44:6_3: Uṇṇatoṇatoti idāni ucco āyatiṁ nīco bhavissati.
atk-s0402a44:6_4: Uṇṇatuṇṇatoti idāni ucco āyatimpi ucco bhavissati.
atk-s0402a44:8_5: So hi sāsane mūlajātāya saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā acalo nāma.
atk-s0402a44:8_9: So hi jhānābhiññānaṁ abhāvena aparipuṇṇaguṇattā samaṇapuṇḍarīko nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a44:8_13: So hi jhānābhiññānaṁ bhāvena paripuṇṇaguṇattā samaṇapadumo nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a44:8_14: Samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti sabbesupi etesu samaṇesu sukhumālasamaṇo muducittasarīro kāyikacetasikadukkharahito ekantasukhī.
atk-s0402a44:9_0: Evaṁ mātikaṁ nikkhipitvā idāni paṭipāṭiyā vibhajanto kathañca,
atk-s0402a44:9_4: Anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamāno viharatīti arahattaṁ patthayanto viharati.
atk-s0402a44:9_9: Macalappattoti rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa puttabhāvena ceva puttesu jeṭṭhakabhāvena ca na tāva
atk-s0402a44:10_1: paribhuñjathā”ti evaṁ dāyakehi yācamāneheva upanītaṁ cīvaraṁ bahuṁ paribhuñjati,
atk-s0402a44:10_15: Kammavipākajānīti vināpi imehi kāraṇehi kevalaṁ pubbe katakammavipākavaseneva jātāni.
atk-s0402a44:10_16: Catunnaṁ jhānānanti ettha khīṇāsavānampi buddhānampi kiriyajjhānāneva adhippetāni.
atk-s0402a44:12_1: Aṭṭhame sāsane laddhappatiṭṭhattā sotāpannova samaṇamacaloti vutto,
atk-s0402a44:12_2: nātibahuguṇattā na bahupattaṁ viya saroruhaṁ sakadāgāmī samaṇapuṇḍarīkoti,
atk-s0402a44:12_3: tato bahutaraguṇattā satapattaṁ viya saroruhaṁ anāgāmī samaṇapadumoti,
atk-s0402a44:12_4: thaddhabhāvakarānaṁ kilesānaṁ sabbaso samucchinnattā mudubhāvappatto khīṇāsavo samaṇasukhumāloti.
atk-s0402a44:14_1: Navame sammādiṭṭhikotiādīhi aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena paṭhamasutte viya satta sekhā gahitā.
atk-s0402a44:14_6: Iti idaṁ suttaṁ paṭhamasutte kathitapuggalānaṁ vaseneva kathitaṁ,
atk-s0402a44:16_1: Dasame paṭhamavāre arahattatthāya payogaṁ anārabhitvā ṭhito pamādavihārī sekhapuggalo kathito.
atk-s0402a44:16_2: Dutiyavāre anuppāditajjhāno āraddhavipassako appamādavihārī sekhapuggalo kathito.
atk-s0402a44:16_3: Tatiyavāre āraddhavipassako appamādavihārī aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī sekhapuggalo kathito,
